name: Meteo
func:
var message = msg.payload.detail + '\n' + 
    "temp=" + msg.data.currently.temperature + "°C (" + msg.payload.mintemp + "°C to " + msg.payload.maxtemp + "°C) \n" +
    "humidity=" + (msg.payload.humidity * 100) + "%\n" +
    "pressure=" + msg.data.currently.pressure + "hPa\n" +
    "windspeed=" + msg.payload.windspeed + "km/h\n" +
    "winddirection=" + msg.payload.winddirection + "\n" + 
    "clouds=" + (msg.payload.clouds * 100) + "%";
    
msg.payload = message
return msg;

name: Fresh deploy
func:
msg.payload = "Fresh (re-)deploy !"
return msg;

name: Render day events
Store Global
Loop on sensors & alarm
Xfer
func: return { 'payload': { 'id': msg.payload } }

name: confirmation message
create response
time.now()
func:
msg.time = new Date().getTime()
return msg;

name: Meteo
func:
var message = msg.forecast.detail + '\n' + 
    "temp=" + msg.data.currently.temperature + "°C (" + msg.forecast.mintemp + "°C to " + msg.forecast.maxtemp + "°C) \n" +
    "humidity=" + (msg.forecast.humidity * 100) + "%\n" +
    "pressure=" + msg.data.currently.pressure + "hPa\n" +
    "windspeed=" + msg.forecast.windspeed + "km/h\n" +
    "winddirection=" + msg.forecast.winddirection + "\n" + 
    "clouds=" + (msg.forecast.clouds * 100) + "%";
    
msg.payload.content = message
return msg;

msg.time = new Date().getTime()
return msg;
